definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: (a) expressingcontinuance, persistence, usu. of the past or present, still, yet, Ge 18:22 [[ואברהם עודנו עמֵד]] and A., he was still standing before ´[[י]] (note oft. so [[עוֹדֶנּוּ]] after cas. pend., Ge 44:14, 1Sa 13:7, 1Ki 12:2, Je 33:1, 2Ch 34:3), Ge 29:7 [[הן עוד היום גדול]] the day is still high, Ge 31:14, Ge 43:7 [[הַעוֹד אֲבִיכֶם חַי]], v:Ge 43:27, Ge 45:3, Ex 4:18, Ex 9:2, Nu 19:13, Ju Jdg 6:24, Jdg 8:20, 1Ki 20:32 [[הַעוֹדֶנּוּ חַי]] 2Sa 14:32 (but Kö:iii. 558 [[עַד]]), 2Sa 18:14; Is 5:25 [[ועור יׇדוֹ נְטוּיׇה]]; Is 10:32 [[עוֹד הַיּוֹם בְּנׁב לַעֲמׂד]] still to-day (such is his haste) will he tarry in Nob; 1Ki 22:44 [[עוד חעם מְזַכְּחִים]] the people were still sacrificing, etc. (so 2Ki 12:4 +); 2Sa 1:9 [[כי־כל־עוד נפשׁי בי]] Job 27:3 (v. [[כּׂל]]

definitions.title: 1 b
definitions.body: end, and Ke; but also We Now); La 4:17 the sf. is anticipatory, either of eyes (Kt) or our (Qr LXX), poet. for [[כָּלוֹת עוֹד עֵינֵינוּ]]; but Dys Löhr al. rd. [[עַד מָה]] for ´[[עַ]] Bi:1 Wild simply [[עוֹד]] 2Ch 14:6 rd. either [[עוֹדֵנוּ]] (sf. 1 pl. antic. of [[לפנינו]]), or [[עוֹד]]. Twice, peculiarly, [[עוֹד לאׁ]] still not (Germ. noch nicht) i.e. not yet (in class. Heb. [[טֶרֶם]]), Je 40:5 [[עוֹדֶנּוּ לא ישׁוב]], 2Ch 20:23 [[ועוד העם לא הֵכִינוּ לבבם]] (the vb. fin. on acc. of [[לאׁ]]). Sq. [[וְ]] Nu 11:33 [[הבשׂר עודנו בין]] [[חרה בעם]] ´[[ואף י]] …[[שׁנּיהם ]] the flesh was still between their teeth ..., and ( = when) etc., (cf. Ps 78:30 f. Job 8:12); and oft. in the phr. ([[מְדַבְּרִים]]) [[מְדַבֵּר]] (´[[עוֹדָם וגו]]) [[עוֹדֶנּוּ]] he (they, etc.) was (were) still speaking, and (= when) etc., Ge 29:9 [[עודנו מְדַבֵּר עמם ורחל באה]], 1Ki 1:22, 1Ki 1:42, 2Ki 6:33, Es 6:14, Da 9:20, Da 9:21, so …[[עוֹד זֶה ]] Job 1:16, Job 1:17 (+ v:Job 1:18 for [[עַד]]): and of the future, 1Ki 1:14, Is 65:24 [[עוֹד]] [[הֵם מְדַבְּרִים ואני אשִׁמע]]); cf. Ex 9:17. (b) Expressing addition or repetition, still, yet, more, Ge 7:4 [[כי לימים עוד שׁבעה]] after yet seven days, Ge 8:10, Ge 8:12, Ge 29:27, Ge 29:30 [[עוד שׁבע שׁנים אחרות]], Ge 45:6, 2Ki 6:33, Is 1:5, Hb Hab 2:3 [[כִּי עוֹד חָזוֹן לַמּוֹעֵד]] (cf. Da 10:14, Da 11:2, Da 11:27, Da 11:35), Je 13:27 [[אַחֲרֵי מָתַי עוֹד]] after how long still ? with stress on the idea of continuance, Ge 46:29 [[וַיֵּבְךְ]] [[עַל חַוׇּארָיו עוֹד]] still going on (AV. a good while), Ru 1:14, Ps 84:5 [[עוד יהללוך]] they will be still praising thee, Job 34:23; with [[עוֹד]] prefixed for emph., Ex 11:1 ´[[עוד נגע אחד אביא על פ]], Is 49:20, Is 56:8 [[עוֹד]] ´[[אֲקַבֵּץ וגו]], Ez Eze 8:13, Eze 8:15, Ps 42:6, Ps 92:15 +; in the phr. [[עוֹד מְעַט וְ]] sq. pf. consec., † Ex 17:4 [[עוד מעט וּסְקָלֻנִי]] yet a little, and they will stone me, Ho 1:4, Je 51:33, cf. Ps 37:10, Is 10:25, Is 29:17; simil. Jon 3:4 (cf. [[בְּעוֹד]] Is 21:16), 2Ch 10:5 (but see LXX and ‖ 1Ki 12:5); [[עוד]] …[[לא ]] no more, both of the past, as Ex 2:3, Jos 5:1, Jos 5:12, 1Ki 10:5, and of the fut., as Ge 17:5 ´[[לא יִקָּרֵא עוד שׁמך א]], Ge 32:29, De 31:2, Is 2:4, Is 30:20, Is 62:4, Je 3:16 + oft., [[לא]] …[[עוד ]] Ge 8:22; so with [[אֵין]] Is 23:10, Je 10:20, Je 48:2, Ps 74:9 al.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: When the continuance is limited by its nature to a single occurrence, [[עוֹד]] becomes = again, Ge 4:25, Ge 9:11 [[לא יִכָרֵת כל בשׂר עוד]], Ge 18:29 [[וַיּׁסֶף עוֹד לְדַבֵּר]] and he added still to speak, i.e. he spake yet again (so oft. with [[יׇסַף]]; v. √), Ge 24:20 [[וַ֫תָּרָץ עוֹד]] and she ran again, Ge 29:33 [[וַתַּ֫הַר עוֹד]], Ge 35:9, Ge 37:9, Ex 3:15, Ex 4:6, De 3:26, 1Sa 10:22 + oft.; with [[עוֹד]] prefixed, Ho 12:10, Je 31:4, Je 31:5, Je 31:23, Je 32:15, Je 33:12, Je 33:13; [[עוֹד]] …[[לא ]] not again, no more, De 13:17, De 34:10.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Still, moreover, besides (not in temporal sense); Ge 19:12 [[עוֹד מי לך פה]] whom hast thou here besides ? Ge 43:6 [[הַעוֹד לָכֶם אָח]] Am 6:10; 1Sa 10:22 [[הֲבָא]] [[עוֹד הֲלֽם אִישׁ]] is there still a man come hither ? (sc. besides ourselves: but LXX We al. [[הֲבָא הֲלֽם]] [[הָאִישׁ]]), 1Sa 16:11 [[עוֹד שָׁאַר הַקָּטָן]], 1Sa 18:8 [[ועוד לו אך המלוכה]], 1Ki 22:7, 1Ki 22:8, 2Ki 4:6 [[אֵין עוֹד כֶָּלִי]], Is 5:4, Je 36:32, Ez Eze 20:27, Eze 23:38, Eze 36:37, Pr 9:9, Ec 12:9, 1Ch 29:3, 2Ch 17:6 +; [[וְאֵין עוֹד]] and there is none besides, † De 4:39 (cf. v:De 4:35), 1Ki 8:60, Is 45:5, Is 45:6, Is 45:14, Is 45:18, Is 45:22 (cf. v:Is 45:21), Is 46:9, Joe 2:27, [[אֲנִי וְאַפְסִי עוֹד]] † Is 47:8, Is 47:10, Zep 2:15.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[בְּעוֹד]], lit. in the continuance of ..., i.e. (a) while yet: Ge 25:6 [[בְּעוֹדֶנּוּ חַי]] while he was yet alive, De 31:27, 2Sa 12:22 [[בְּעוֹד הַיֶּלֶד חַי]], Is 28:4, Ps 39:2, Job 29:5; [[בְּעוֹדִי]] alone, = so long as I live, Ps 104:33, Ps 146:2 (‖[[בְּחַיַּי]]); 2Sa 3:35 [[בעוד היום]], Je 15:9 [[בעוד יומם]], Pr 31:15. (b) within yet, usu. of time, Ge 40:13 ´[[בְּעוֹד שְׁלשֶׁת יׇמִים יִשָּׂא וגו]] within yet three days, etc., v:Ge 40:19, Jos 1:11, Is 7:8, Is 21:16 [[בְּעוֹד שָׁנׇה]] (sq. pf. cons.), Je 28:3, Je 28:11, Am 4:7; but also of distance, Ge 48:7 [[בְּעוֹד כִּבְרַת ארץ לבוא]] [[אפרתה]] (cf. Ge 35:16 ´[[ויהי עוד וגו]]); cf. SI:2 [[ובעוד שׁלשׁ]] [[[נׇּקֵב]]][[אמה לה]].

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: † [[מֵעוֹד]], lit. from the continuance of ..., only in the phr. ([[מֵעוֹדְְ]]) [[מֵעוֹדִי]] [[עד היום הזה]] ever since I was (thou wast) unto this day, Ge 48:15, Nu 22:30.
